summary: Internal email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons Public Information Office regarding distribution of a press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email coordinates distribution to media outlets and provides language for potential congressional inquiries.

persons.name: Mike Carroll
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who will have MCC NY send the press release PDF to media who contacted the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Press Release Distribution for Epstein Death
events.description: The Federal Bureau of Prisons Public Information Office coordinates sending a final press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death to approximately 50 reporters and prepares for potential congressional inquiries.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York (MCC NY)
keyFacts: This document is an internal email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons dated August 10, 2019.
The email coordinates distribution of a press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death to approximately 50 media outlets.
Mike Carroll is identified as the Bureau of Prisons staff member responsible for sending the press release to media who contacted MCC NY.
The document indicates preparation for potential congressional inquiries about Epstein's death.
The email shows coordination between the Public Information Office and OLA (Office of Legislative Affairs) regarding communication strategy.
